00001 =head1 NAME
00002 
00003     Label
00004 
00005 
00006 =head1 SYNPOSIS
00007 
00008     use Carp;
00009     use GD;
00010     use WWPlot;
00011     use Fun;
00012 
00013 
00014 =head1 DESCRIPTION
00015 
00016 This module defines labels for the graph objects (WWPlot).
00017 
00018 
00019 =head2 Usage
00020 
00021     $label1 = new Label($x_value, $y_value, $label_string, $label_color, @justification)
00022     $justification   =   one of ('left', 'center', 'right) and ('bottom', 'center', 'top')
00023                          describes the position of the ($x_value, $y_value) within the string.
00024                          The default is 'left', 'top'
00025 
00026 
00027 
00028 =head2  Example
00029 
00030     $new_label = new Label ( 0,0, 'origin','red','left', 'top')
00031     @labels    = $graph->lb($new_label);
00032 
00033 
00034 
00035 =cut
00036 
00037 
00038 BEGIN {
00039     be_strict(); # an alias for use strict.  This means that all global variable must contain main:: as a prefix.
00040 }
00041 package Label;
00042 use strict;
00043 #use Exporter;
00044 #use DynaLoader;
00045 #use GD;   # this is needed to be able to define GD::gdMediumBoldFont and other terms used by GD
00046 #          # however  constants from GD need to be addressed fully, they have not been imported.
00047 #use  "WWPlot.pm";
00048 #Because of the way problem modules are loaded 'use' is disabled.
00049 
00050 
00051 @Label::ISA = qw(WWPlot);
00052 
00053 my %fields =(
00054         'x'     =>  0,  
00055         'y'     =>  0,
00056         color   =>  'black',
00057         font    =>  GD::gdMediumBoldFont,    #gdLargeFont
00058         # constants from GD need to be addressed fully, they have not been imported.
00059         str     =>  "",
00060         lr_nudge => 0, #justification parameters
00061         tb_nudge => 0,
00062 );
00063 
00064 
00065 sub new {
00066     my $class               =   shift;
00067     my $self            = { 
00068                 %fields,
00069     };
00070     
00071     bless $self, $class;
00072     $self->_initialize(@_);
00073     return $self;
00074 }
00075 
00076 sub _initialize {
00077     my $self                =   shift;
00078     my ($x,$y,$str,$color,@justification)   =   @_;
00079     $self -> x($x);
00080     $self -> y($y);
00081     $self -> str($str);
00082     $self -> color($color) if defined($color);
00083     my $j;
00084     foreach $j (@justification)  {
00085         $self->lr_nudge( - length($self->str) )     if $j eq 'right';
00086         $self->tb_nudge( - 1                  )     if $j eq 'bottom';
00087         $self->lr_nudge( - ( length($self->str) )/2)if $j eq 'center';
00088         $self->tb_nudge(-0.5)                       if $j eq 'middle';
00089 #       print "\njustification=$j",$self->lr_nudge,$self->tb_nudge,"\n";
00090     }
00091 }
00092 sub draw {
00093     my $self = shift;
00094     my $g = shift;   #the containing graph
00095     $g->im->string( $self->font,
00096                     $g->ii($self->x)+int( $self->lr_nudge*($self->font->width) ),
00097                     $g->jj($self->y)+int( $self->tb_nudge*($self->font->height) ),
00098                     $self->str,
00099                     ${$g->colors}{$self->color}
00100                 );
00101  
00102 }
00103 
00104 sub AUTOLOAD {
00105     my $self = shift;
00106     my $type = ref($self) || die "$self is not an object";
00107     my $name = $Label::AUTOLOAD;
00108     $name =~ s/.*://;  # strip fully-qualified portion
00109     unless (exists $self->{'_permitted'}->{$name} ) {
00110         die "Can't find '$name' field in object of class $type";
00111     }
00112     if (@_) {
00113         return $self->{$name} = shift;
00114     } else {
00115         return $self->{$name};
00116     }
00117 
00118 }
